dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze complex problems and identify key variables to solve them methodically.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their problem-solving approach, often taking a more holistic view.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will weigh options carefully, considering evidence and data to inform their choices.
Your FarTwin will consider personal feelings and values when making decisions, often prioritizing emotional connections over rational analysis.

dimensions.label: Financial Management
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin manage finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and budgeting, aiming to minimize unnecessary expenses.
Your FarTwin will enjoy spending money on experiences and luxuries, often prioritizing enjoyment over frugality.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin learn best?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take initiative and self-motivate, preferring to work independently and at their own pace.
Your FarTwin will benefit from clear instructions and a structured learning environment, often needing guidance to stay on track.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will excel in visual arts, enjoying activities like painting, drawing, or crafting.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through performance, such as music, dance, or acting.

dimensions.label: Technology Adoption
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach new technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be enthusiastic and quick to adopt new technologies, often being one of the first in their social circle.
Your FarTwin will approach new technology with caution, preferring to observe and learn before jumping in.

dimensions.label: Relationship Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin build relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong support networks, fostering deep and meaningful connections with others.
Your FarTwin will value their independence and may struggle to form close relationships or open up to others.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prioritize time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize punctuality and adherence to schedules, often being highly organized and efficient.
Your FarTwin will be more relaxed about time constraints, preferring to adapt to changing circumstances and go with the flow.
